title: Impossible Travel Alert Triage
description: A SOC analyst receives an alert that a user has logged in from India and Brazil within 5 minutes. The analyst must triage this 'impossible travel' alert.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert and confirm the user account and the two geographic locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst retrieves the core details of the alert.

tasks.description: Check if the user is using a VPN, which could explain the anomalous locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst checks VPN logs and finds no active session for the user.

tasks.description: Conclude that this is a likely account compromise and escalate to the incident response team to reset the user's password and terminate sessions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst makes a correct triage decision and escalates for immediate containment.
